title: HD Watch Face - Dip & Elegant
summary: Interactive Watch Face for android Wear

descriptionHTML:
Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!

Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188



Model Number
DW-A59

Category
Decent

Dip Watch Face is exceptional watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

INTERACTIVE TOUCH INCLUDE

 Change Needle Colors
 Show/ Hide Date
 Switch between Wear & Phone Battery
 Switch Between Normal & Night Mode
 Turn Off/ On Interactive Touch

It has following features

Features:

 Interactive Touch
 Night Mode
 smooth/tick needles
 1.6 millions Colors Theme
 date
 day
 month
 Wear & Device Battery
 Custom Ambient Mode with Unlimited Colors
 Default Ambient modes Pack with Unlimited Colors
 FULL-COLORED AMBIENT MODE
 Short & Big Notification Cards
 Translucent Notification Cards
 Notification Setting for Ambient Mode
 Dark & Light Status Bar
 Dark & Light Hotword
 Dark Whole Screen


Configuration:

 Turn On/Off Interactive Touch
 Turn On/ Off or Auto Setting of Night Mode
 Pick your favorite color
 Change Needle Style (smooth OR tick )
 Display Wear OR Device Battery
 Hide Battery
 Hide Date, Day & Month
 pick your favorite ambient mode
 Change Ambient Mode Color
 Set Full-Ambient Mode if you wish


For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com


Tip 1
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Dip Watch Face as your watch face


Note
Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches & other android wears...
